name: Chance Meeting with a Lover
description:
Made for O2A2 2023 Queer Edition Jam.

You find yourself in a room, talking with a man about his life.  He won't let you speak beyond a few prompts, but he seems to have a lot on his mind.  It seems he's lonely and has been wanting someone to talk to.

-----

  • 6 Endings
  • 1000 words, 1 sprite, 1 background, 1 song, 1 piece of menu art
  • Obsession and love and regret

-----

Music by Snabisch
